75613.<attr><feel_angry_lv3><end_attr>「おいっ てめェ:
Oii, you! You're not trampling my precious flower field, are you!
If you don't hurry up and get out of here, your blood will rust my sword! AAH! HURRY UP AND GET LOST!

75614.<attr><feel_angry_lv2><end_attr><icon_ex:
Hey... What are you doing! Taking photos of me without my permission like that, the nerve of you; what the heck are you planning!
Aah? There's a rumor about a giant Leery Lout around here that's scaring a little girl, you say?
I've been patrolling this flower field the whole time and haven't seen anything like that. Somebody's seeing things...
...No way, that huge Leery Lout thing is about me isn't it!?... I get it. Looking how I do, one can't help but mistake me for a monster.
I'm the Dwarf, Kottso. I made a vow to defend this flower field from monsters.
Please tell that little girl who who wanted to come to this flower field that I take care of kids, not get mad them.
